text: Pulau Brani is an island off the southern coast of Singapore, in Keppel Harbour, that was once home to Orang Laut. Pulau Brani translates to "isle of the brave" in Malay. Pulau Brani has a land area of 1.22 square kilometres (0.47 square miles). ==References== Category:Geography of Singapore Category:Islands of Asia Category:Places in Singapore
title: Pulau Brani
